SET(SOURCE_GROUP_BACKUP "${SOURCE_GROUP}")
SET(SOURCE_GROUP "${SOURCE_GROUP}/4diac-Kafka")
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("${FORTE_EXTERNAL_MODULES_DIRECTORY}/4diac-Kafka" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/external/4diac-Kafka")
SET(SOURCE_GROUP "${SOURCE_GROUP_BACKUP}")
SET(SOURCE_GROUP_BACKUP "${SOURCE_GROUP}")
SET(SOURCE_GROUP "${SOURCE_GROUP}/VDMA")
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("${FORTE_EXTERNAL_MODULES_DIRECTORY}/VDMA" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/external/VDMA")
SET(SOURCE_GROUP "${SOURCE_GROUP_BACKUP}")
